string-array.name: level1
string-array.item: A Princess makes an appearance.
Jake uses his powers.
Someone uses spaghetti arms.
Ice King captures and man-handles a princess.
Every time someone says something \"Mathmatical.\"
Anytime Princess Bubblegum gives mixed signals.
Every time Ice King\'s crown is knocked off.
Every time someone farts, barfs or burps.
Anytime someone plays Bmo.
Every time you spot the snail!

string-array.name: level2
string-array.item: Anytime someone sings a song, drink until it\’s over.
Finn\’s love for Princess Bubblegum is mentioned
Anyone says bro or fist bumps.
Glob or lump is used in place of swearing.
If LSP names animals and gossips with them.
Jake plays his viola or shelby shows his face.
Ice King strips or you see his underwear.
Anytime adventure time is said, yelled or mentioned.
Anytime the candy kingdom is threatened.
If the Ice King is writing in or reading his diary.

string-array.name: level3
string-array.item: Finn\’s voice cracks or is noticeably younger in consecutive episodes.
Lsp gives a name to an animal and gossips with them.
Anytime Lsp mentions Brad or Melissa.
Drink for every penguin you see.
Anytime Marceline plays her bass.
Anytime tree trunks creeps you out.
Someone uses magic for good or evil.
Cinnamon bun fails Princess Bubblegum.
Lady rainicorn appears in an episode and speaks Korean.
Anytime the Gumball Guardians awake.

string-array.name: chara1
string-array.item: Finn\’s voice cracks or is noticeably younger in consecutive episodes.
Finn\’s love for Princess Bubblegum is mentioned.
Whenever Finn fights someone and draws his sword.
Take a drink if he yells Adventure Time!
Anytime Jake has to save Finn with his powers.
Whenever Finn gives his battle cry.
Every time he makes a meme face, including sparkly eyes.
Whenever Finn stops to save someone.
Anytime you see Finn\’s Hair or his hat is taken off.
Baby Finn is shown.

string-array.name: chara2
string-array.item: Jake plays his viola or shelby shows his face.
Every time Jake uses his powers.
Anytime Jake eats ice cream or seen cooking.
Take a drink every time he does something immoral.
If he\'s seen with Lady Rainicorn.
Take a drink each time Jake\'s voice changes.
Anytime Jake is seen playing BMO
Every time Jake encounters or sees his Dad in anyway.
Whenever Jake leaves after Finn gets weird or into something.
If Jake is shown as a young pup.

string-array.name: chara3
string-array.item: If the Ice King is writing in or reading his diary.
Ice King strips or you see his underwear.
Every time Ice King\’s crown is knocked off.
Every time Ice King captures and man-handles a princess.
If the Ice King uses his powers for good or evil
Take a drink if he says, "Gunter!"
Whenever he plays the drums.
Anytime he says something funny that suddenly becomes incredibly depressing when you remember his past.
Anytime you can hear Spongebob through the Ice King.
Anytime the Ice King is seen Beard Flying.

string-array.name: chara4
string-array.item: Anytime Princess Bubblegum gives mixed signals.
Every time Princess Bubblegum gets captured by the Ice King.
Whenever the Princess calls for the Banana Guards.
If she is seen on the throne.
Anytime an experiment goes horribly wrong i.e anytime you see Lemon Grab.
Take a drink if she yells at someone.
Anytime the Princess experiences Sanity Slippage.
Take a drink if she\'s wearing a different outfit than her pink dress.
Take a drink if she does or says something scientific.
Anytime she lies to protect the Candy Kingdom

string-array.name: chara5
string-array.item: If she says \"Whatever.\"
Anytime she says "Glob" or "Lumping".
Take a drink if her arms are akimbo.
Every time Lumpy Space is shown or mentioned.
Take a drink if she wants to be more beautiful.
If LSP names animals and gossips with them.
Take a drink if she\'s being melodramatic.
If she mentions Brad or Melissa.
Whenever she mentions partying.
Every time she mentions her lumps.
